function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to contagious diseases through literature search and review of COVID-19 related materials.","Impact":"Increased risk of contracting COVID-19 or other contagious diseases through handling or reading materials that may have been contaminated.","Mitigation":"Ensure strict adherence to hygiene protocols, including regular handwashing and sanitization of materials. Implement remote access to literature where possible to minimize physical handling of materials.","Technologies":"Remote access platforms for literature review, digital document handling and sharing tools, contactless document delivery systems.","People":"Researchers, reviewers, and anyone involved in literature search and review.","Owner":"Research institutions, academic libraries, and publishing organizations."}]}
